snippet: A high school football game in Miami on Friday night ended early after gunshots were heard in the distance, sending players and coaches ducking for cover.
abstract: Gunshots are heard in distance during high school football game in Miami and game is called; police say three males have been arrested.
lead_paragraph: A high school football game in Miami on Friday night ended early after gunshots were heard in the distance, sending players and coaches ducking for cover.

headline.main: Game in Miami Is Halted by Gunshots
headline.print_headline: Game in Miami Is Halted by Gunshots
